DOC.brief_title: Use BrainPort® Balance Device Improve Balance Adults With Balance Deficits Due Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Following baseline assessment , subject participate 5 consecutive day ( 10 hour ) clinic train BrainPort balance device Physical Therapist . Assessments repeat end clinic training . Following clinic training , subject take device home use two ( 2 ) 20 minute training session day . Subjects return clinic one ( 1 ) day test use device home 7 week .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old . Diagnosis stroke least 6 month . Reached plateau discharge physical therapy . Able ambulate without assistance . Ongoing balance problem . Able read understand inform consent form , willing sign inform consent form . Current oral health problem determine health questionnaire examination oral cavity . Any medical condition would interfere performance assessment . History seizure . Pregnancy . Cognitive deficit ( MiniMental 25 ) , joint replacement , cervical vertigo , major neurologic disease , major depression disable psychiatric disorder . Known neuropathy tongue skin tactile system . Prior exposure BrainPort® balance device . Subjects unwilling unable adhere study requirement , include completion training period , evaluation test , return clinic followup visit . Subjects undergone middle ear surgery sacrifice damage chorda tympani nerve , lingual nerve , hypoglossal nerve .
